text.name: Thoracalgia
text.abName: Sleeping Bag of a Bygone Day
text.desc:
[BeforeAttack] Apply (highest Reson.) [Breath] Potency to all allies (max 4)
- At 3+ Pride Reson., apply +1 [Breath] Count to the affected units, and apply 1 [ReleaseBreath] as well next turn

text.name: Thoracalgia
text.abName: Sleeping Bag of a Bygone Day
text.desc:
[BeforeAttack] Apply (highest Reson.) [Breath] Potency to all allies (max <style="highlight">6)
- At 3+ Pride Reson., apply +1 [Breath] Count to the affected units, and apply 1 [ReleaseBreath] as well next turn
coinDescs: <style="highlight">Deal +([Breath] Potency + [Breath] Count)% damage on Critical Hit (max 20%)

text.name: Thoracalgia
text.abName: Sleeping Bag of a Bygone Day
text.desc:

coinDescs: Deal +([Breath] Potency + [Breath] Count)% damage on Critical Hit (max <style="highlight">40%)

passiveList.name: Breath
passiveList.desc:
Next Turn Start after using this E.G.O Skill: gain 1 [NebulizerExhale] (once per turn)
- This value Stacks throughout the Encounter

Combat Start: gain 1 [NebulizerExhale] every time this unit applies 10 [Breath] Count to allies with [NebulizerExhale] effects

Turn End: starting from allies with the lowest HP percentages, heal ([NebulizerExhale] Stack)% HP for (highest Reson.) allies (max 6)
- If the unit receiving healing has 20+ [Breath] Potency, activate healing 1 more time

text.name: Thoracalgia
text.abName: Sleeping Bag of a Bygone Day
text.desc:
[CantIdentify]
Targets randomly
[BeforeAttack] At less than 20 [Breath] Potency, gain up to 20 [Breath] Potency and consume ([Breath] Potency gained x 2)% HP on self
- Cannot be Staggered or defeated due to this effect
[BeforeAttack] Apply (highest Reson.) [Breath] Potency to all allies (max 4)
- At 3+ Pride Reson., apply +1 [Breath] Count to the affected units, and apply 1 [ReleaseBreath] and 1 [IndigoDamageUp] as well next turn
